author: claMaga
title: Carino, particolare
review: Molto carino, piccolo e altamente giocabile. Bello il meccanismo di aggancio delle minifigure com scopa volante. Molto bello il profilo del castello con gli stemmi delle case.

author: Denimandlace
title: Great  Value for mony
review: The best thing about this set is the value of some of the more esoteric parts particularly the transparent 'flying rods'. To purchase 3 of these independently costs as much if not more that the set itself. In addition you also get 4 unique minifigs plus some other cool parts. It has recently been on sale at Kmart in Australia for $35 AUD nearly a third of the original Lego cost. All good stuff for building your own MOC's.
